script:
const thresholdAlgorithms=([""].concat(Object.keys(IJS.Static.threshold))).map( thresholdAlgorithm => { return `` }) const greyAlgorithms=Object.keys(IJS.Static.grey).map( greyAlgorithm => { return `` }) const imageInfo=API.getData('imageInfo'); const isColor=imageInfo && imageInfo.nbComponents>1; const template=`

Image processing parameters

${isColor ? ` `:''}
Grey: Convert image to grey using
Bluring:


Radius of the gaussian filter

Sobel filter:


Apply a Sobel filter (Edge detection)

Threshold: Automatic or Manual threshold:
Should be a value from 0 to 100 if algorithm is empty
ROI creation:

Select parameters to create Region Of Interests (ROI)

Algorithm:

Scale:

ROI filters:

Select parameters to create Region Of Interests (ROI)

Unit: Pixels Size
Surface: min: - max:
Height: min: - max:
Width: min: - max:
Painting

Regions of interest (ROI)

Color: Color for painting ROI, empty = distinctColors
Alpha: Opacity for painting ROI (0 to 255)
ROI Shape: Color for painting ROI, empty = distinctColors

ROI labels

Unit: Pixels Size
Property:
Property value to display on the ROI
Color:
Font:

ROI Analysis

Property:
Property value to display on the ROI
Color:
Alpha:
`; API.createData('prefsTemplate2', template);
